lenders.name: Nancy

Yo quiero ayudar los personas que necesitan ayudar. Yo pienso Kiva es una manera bueana a ayudar!

I was in Zimbabwe for three months while in college and was able to help someone with a gift of 20 USD. I was able to see the difference that  can be made by helping one person.  So every month when I get paid I provide a loan to others that need a loan hoping to make a difference.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a travel agent and have been for 32 years.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Administrative Specialist in the Juvenile Probation Dept. I love my job.  I love children/adolescents.

lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me his spirit of love and the the spirit to share ,it is my desire to help when I can.

lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand every now and then.

I think this is a terrific idea.

lenders.name: Nerissa

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kathi

lenders.loan_because:
we are a young couple who are working hard, while trying to better ourselves.  we are trying to create a better world where our baby will grow up and be happy, we know that only by making other people happy and helping each other will there be hope for the future.
We are all citizens of the world, and the lives of all of us directly or indirectly affect us and touch us.

We firmly believe we are not citizens of only a country, we think as ourselves as citizens of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mommy trying to continue my studies in law or teaching, I love my job as a mommy right now, is challenging but so rewarding and my husband works as an inventory manager in a car dealership, he works really hard and all the time for our family.

lenders.name: rena
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a physical fitness instructor.  I care about my students and their own ability to make themselves a healthy life.

lenders.occupational_info: Retired.  Interests are: quilting, needlework, golf, time with grandchildren, reading.

lenders.name: mag
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!!

lenders.name: ida

lenders.name: Aliseya
lenders.loan_because: because it's a good thing to do.

lenders.loan_because: I am called by Jesus Christ to help the poor, the orphans and the widows.  I do this out of the blessings God has bestowed upon me.

lenders.name: Ezgi

lenders.name: John & Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Justa

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.occupational_info: To use my passion and enthusiasm to empower, inspire and encourage others to live their highest visions, in a loving and supportive way.  Empowering others to create their future, love their life and live their purpose and dreams.

lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need money to start a business. I want to help someone achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I make food for people, dessert. I also make sauces for desserts and salad dressings.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people & I find myself financial able to do that. It is a great feeling to now I am able to help someone.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has opened the door and given me and others the opportunity to be charitable and help others. I Love it!!  KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK KIVA !!

lenders.name: Lucy, Lily and Lilah
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of giving other people opportunities they deserve. I am interested in loaning to women, especially who have children to support. My goal is to support women so they can better educate their children and better their lives for generations to come.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by those who desire to change their own situation as fellow entrepreneurs.  I am so blessed and thankful to be a part of their dream.

lenders.name: Don & Joanne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with a wonderful family.  Kiva is a great way for us to help other families around the world.

lenders.name: Darla
lenders.loan_because: I want to give and have found a way to help others who need it. I feel wonderful in helping another reach their goals.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help.   I would not be successful today without the people that belived in me and loaned me the resources I needed to build my bussiness.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I can make a positive difference in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a dentist, and I am currently looking for employment.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful way to be a world citizen

lenders.name: Brice
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how much a little can do in someone's life. Because I want to help, but faceless charities aren't for me. Because someday, once I am done with school, I want to do micro financing as a job, but I'm not patient enough to wait that long.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently am going to University, but to pay for this I work at a few different jobs. I am an office assistant (I file papers, do computer work and answer phones for a company). I also manage the sound equipment for my University (set-up speakers, rent out equipment and make sure all our equipment works).

lenders.name: jeri
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help  make someones  life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be older and not work outside of my home

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I find it thrilling to think I can help someone on the other side of the world, with just a small investment.  I hope to continue this for the rest of my life, I enjoy watching the progress of the patrons, and wish I could send them a message to say, good work, well done, you make me so proud,.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: this is a unique opportunity to be part of a team of like-minded individuals making a small investment with an enormous impact.  That the investment returns as the loans are repaid and can continue to work for others makes it brilliant.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for various publications and also volunteer time to local, national and international organizations, particularly those  involved with the preservation of heirloom plants and seeds.

lenders.name: Cati
lenders.loan_because:
I feel karmically obligated.
"Investing in women is the most sustainable way to grow a community." Prince Charles, in Harmony
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library at a college. I help people learn to write and how to gather and assemble information.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I can't afford to give money when I don't know if my money is going directly to the cause.  This organization seems great and I am glad to help.  I usually only give to Native American causes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a famous tourist attraction and clean up after very messy people.

lenders.name: Ute Sonja
lenders.loan_because: I like to see that people are helped to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am a self-employed artist, and want to help out where I can-- what a great way to assist other folks around the world.  Kiva, you rock!
lenders.occupational_info: Musician/actor/comedian

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to be able to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing and editing--but mostly taking care of Baby H.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: mkd
lenders.loan_because: OPRAH for president!! As a single parent, I struggled for years with expenses relating to feeding, clothing, housing and educating my children. Luckily, I was born "middle class" in the United States and had the opportunity to educate myself. So, I already had a good career and still could not make ends meet. I loan because I want to assist parents in their effort to protect, house, educate and raise healthy children.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work as a counselor (therapist/ mental health professional), I listen to others and help provide solutions to problems by talking, coaching and consultation. With KIVA, I can help by giving financially.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: My Dad loaned me money to buy land for my first home and a bank loaned me money to start my own business.I wouldn't be where I am today without that "start up" help .It's time to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people to learn to walk and move again without pain

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward!

lenders.name: FluffyStarr
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who may not have the kind of opportunities I have living in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I sing, and make music, and record songs. I hope I can make a career of it, so that I can help people.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and I was lucky to have the support of my family to get me through.  I would love to make someone else's dreams come true now!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children each day, teaching them, helping them, keeping them safe, warm and fed.

lenders.name: Adrienne & Shaune
lenders.occupation: stay at home mom & heavy equipment hauling
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to feel like we're helping out.

lenders.name: Thyra
lenders.loan_because: Friends and relatives helped me out once when I struggled with a small business.  I'd like to pass that on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students and their families to help them finance a college education.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I would like to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
"Ignorance is bliss..."
"if you knew you would be in a fight for your life tomorrow, would you train harder today?"
"ma! The meatloaf!"

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others who have not been given the same opportunities as I.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at several colleges.  Most of my students are in the nursing profession.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I feel grateful to have been born in America and want to give others the same opportunities we have here.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family and I go to school to become a Nurse

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Where's the downside?
lenders.occupational_info: Social work

lenders.name: Don & Susie
lenders.loan_because: We've been helped by others and we'd like to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people find homes and business locations.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to people in the world, and it feels good to know I'm contributing to the fulfillment of someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a graduate program assistant in a university. Typical duties for me are enrolling students in courses, setting up audio-visual equipment, and providing course material online for students.

lenders.name: Manu
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people.  And I love doing it through Kiva because unlike a lot of other orginizations where you can just donate money, with Kiva you actually see who you're donating to and you know a little bit about them.  It makes it more personal and I like that a lot.

lenders.name: Renoda
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving to those who want to better themselves, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Tracey-ann
lenders.loan_because: To feel good,to make someone smile.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to have someone believe in your dream and put their money where their mouth is.  My father has always supported my wild and crazy endeavors and now I'd like to support yours!
lenders.occupational_info: I rent cameras out to producers and cameramen who create motion pictures, documentaries and other multimedia for entertainment and education.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to start a business of my own and know how hard it is to find funding.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying so that I can achieve my goals and be successful.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I think it's good karma to do what we can to help others who are really working hard for their goals.

lenders.name: Yoshi
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who can help themselves!  I want to make a difference in people's lives for future success.

lenders.name: Mikini
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone realize their dream.  Everyone deserves a chance to become a success story, no matter how big or how small their goals are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the realm of Information Technology in the area of Security.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. I've been blessed and when I needed help someone was always there for me. I want to be there for someone else. I believe in these people and I want to help in the only way I know how.
lenders.occupational_info: For many years I supplied hospitals with medicine and nutrition products. I was paid well for my work and now that I am disabled this is my way of giving back to the world.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: because I can.  I think this is one of the most inspiring ways of giving back, and I'm proud to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel the United States doing service at 30,000 ft.  Taking our passengers from point A to point B in safety and comfort, in a professional and courteous manner.  When I'm on the ground, and the Spirit moves me, I will perform at one of our New York cabarets/clubs, or at a special event outside of the City.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I have always said, what can I do, what can I do, and now this site is one answer.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell magazine advertising space for people wanting to sell homes.

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: helping/loaning brings a good feeling inside me......  thanks

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I CARE, and want to see others succeed in life. You put your mind to anything you will go farther then you ever dreamed.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do not work due to illness however I am receiveing disability and if it weren't for GOD and my FAITH, I wouldn't be able to do this with my whole heart.
It make's me feel better.

lenders.name: Lady Cunegonde
lenders.loan_because: I was given enormous opportunities that my immigrant parents and grandparents could never have imagined. I want to give someone else a hand up so that they can achieve the same unimaginable future for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to make money thru consulting, Ebay and any other way I can while also trying to appreciate the gift of life I've been given.

lenders.name: Leroy
lenders.loan_because: I believe
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with a life of abundance, and am grateful for the chance to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an investment in people and their potential. It's an investment where the rate of return is not measured in percentages, but rather the hopes and dreams our loans  can foster.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer  advice to families on how to invest their savings.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to make a difference, no matter how small!

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to create change when they have the support and the resources they need.

lenders.name: Daddy Michael & Peppy
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to work deserves a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: My daughter Perpetua and I serve God through his Son Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Rex
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit people to work for my company.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful opportunity to be able to help those less fortunate and in need. Most of these people are hard working and want to make their lives better for themselves and their children. This program is a great way to help them come closer to reaching their goals and fulfiling their dreams. Just by being a small part of their success and happiness makes it worth it.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I have a good life and would not have this life without many people who helped me along my own path - it is only right to pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer.  I write for magazines and am a novelist.  I have a small home based business making jewelry.    I also work in a call center where people call to make insurance claims.

lenders.name: Susan and John
lenders.occupation: John is an  engineer; Susan is a paralegal.
lenders.loan_because: it's an incredibly easy and fun way to help someone out.

lenders.name: Tutu
lenders.occupational_info: Help people buy a home.

lenders.name: Sandra and JB
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people and I was raised by wonderful parents and grandparents who always helped others in need. I also donate in memory of my Father Joseph Bueno (JB)  who passed away March 19, 2010. As of June 2014 I am also donating in memory of my only Brother Joseph Bueno Jr..

lenders.name: Liba
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro finance can help people achieve their dreams and improve their lives. I've done a good deal of traveling and love connecting with people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large international organization which defends human rights around the world. I help raise money for the organization and organize awareness campaigns around the issues.

lenders.name: Robert and Daphne
lenders.loan_because:
I had a very primative upbringing. Woodburning cook stove, carrying water, heating water for baths, raising our own animals and garden for food. I know how hard it is to live, and all the hard work. 
My situation has changed and now we are able to help some other people and hopefully it will create a circle and those people will help others.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: it is a joy to share with others.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: It's something we should all do...help each other.

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone who is in need. I like knowing how the money is being used and that the people getting the loans are working hard to have  better lives for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher at elementary schools (children 5 years old - 12 years old) for almost 30 years.  I now teach classes to teachers and other educators.

lenders.name: J Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I care that others are working hard to succeed in this hard life.  I want to help and hope that you will also help others when you are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a hospital typing patient medical reports.  I am a single mom that raised three successful children.  I worked hard to teach them to love God, be successful, and help others in need.

lenders.name: cheryl
lenders.loan_because: it helps some one succeed

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I can - and I believe in the difference one person can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for many years in the Career Development field helping people find employment and a sense of value in the work they do.  I also am self employed on a part-time basis following my own passion for creativity with a home based studio offering an opportunity to share crafts and conversation with women.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a helpful thing to do

God has blessed me in life and

someone wanting to make something of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a hospital and with a

be wrong.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because it feels good and I wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: Send Out Cards is a way for me to keep in touch with all my friends and family and act on my promptings.

lenders.name: Ali & Kristofer
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed with abundance.  There is always enough to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are actors and singers who perform in stage and television shows.  We feel so blessed to have a job that we love and that allows us to give back to the world.

lenders.name: leah
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: I have had many blessings in my life and I want to give because it is rewarding to see how someone's life can be improved with very little.  Simply, I am happy to see others happier as well.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me to bless others.

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help fellow human beings and knowing I am making a difference in someone's life!

lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help, and it just feels good to do so.

lenders.name: Jesse and Sarah
lenders.loan_because: we are very fortunate in our lives and we would like to help those in need who are working hard to succeed and provide for their families.

lenders.name: Stacy

lenders.occupational_info: It is a restaurant that sells Chinese food, and I take it to peoples homes for them so they don't have to leave the house.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care. Along my life, I have been given many oppurtunities to succeed, mostly because someone believed in me. I want to give that feeling back.

I run a graphic design business creating logos and advertisements for other businesses. I sing for radio commercials. All gifts and nothing but faith every day.

lenders.name: bailey,mommy & harley
lenders.loan_because: it 's always better to help others improve their lives.   Peace
lenders.occupational_info: i provive health care to people

lenders.name: Nancy

lenders.name: John

lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our children the joy of giving and helping people.

lenders.name: Carl and Alexis
lenders.loan_because:
For two reasons:

1.  To share with others the incredible blessings that have been given to me by my Lord and Saviour, Jesus Christ, and

2.  To promote Compassionate Capitalism, which is the road to true freedom, both as a person and a country.

Freedom is second only to salvation with regards to gifts from the Heavenly Father to His creation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Registered Nurse in long-term and rehabilitative care, but I am working on becoming financially free through entrepreneurship and social marketing.

lenders.name: The Castro Family
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need and are excited to see this organization and support it's purpose.

lenders.name: Mauricio and Teresa

lenders.occupational_info: I own a company that provides educational services for Latin-Americans and Canadians.

lenders.name: Corina
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone is what makes life good.
lenders.occupational_info: A regular day includes working on budgets, contracts, and special projects to make the engineering department more efficient.

lenders.name: The Milligans
lenders.loan_because:
"Well done is better than well said"

"He that hath a trade; hath an estate."

.Benjamin Franklin
lenders.occupational_info: I help families find and purchase homes and help them sell their homes for the best price when they need to move to another home or community. Often they move for better jobs or better schools for their children. It is very rewarding to help someone who has never owned a home and see their smile when they finally do reach their goal of a new home of their own!

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else do what I am in the process of doing, which is opening a new business, and building a new home.  The best way to get what you want, is to give it away to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell women's apparel, costume jewelry, hats, and accessories.  I am in the process of opening a boutique this fall, called Metamorphosis Wardrobe & Accessories Boutique, in downtown Silver Spring, MD.

lenders.loan_because: I wish there were more opportunities to give where I know the money will be put to good use!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government helping the citizens of my city to stay safe.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing better than helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service Agent with an airline.

lenders.name: Kathi

lenders.occupational_info: technician

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We all should; Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources to do so and i love  the chance to give other people opportunities to fulfill their own life's desires and dreams.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I have been in need many times and have had people give to me.  Giving is my way of showing my gratitude and it really is more fun to give than recieve.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money and hire people to build houses.  I then sell these houses.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I've had times in my life where others helped me to get a foot up. I worked hard to deserve that help, and can now pass it along to others. It's a little bit that can mean so much in a life.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a single mother, hired to work in a medical office, at a university.  I taught myself to use a computer, and then to look for any way to make my boss's work more efficient.  I tried to see problems ahead and to offer 2 or more possible solutions.  This way I became indispensible and worked there for 15 years.

lenders.name: Mandie
lenders.loan_because: There are people in this world who deserve a chance to make something of themselves, to make a better life  for their families.  I have seen first hand what a little help can do.  It truly can, change the world.

lenders.loan_because: A hand up is better than a hand out.

lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be self employed and love what I do. I make a good living at it and would like to help others start their business.

lenders.name: Allen & Cricket
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people pursue their dreams and goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle the shipping and receiving of materials in a wood work shop.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.occupational_info: I am the chef at an assisted living facility.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: It's all about paying it forward.

lenders.name: Nicolas
lenders.loan_because: I realised that I was lucky to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a lab, specialized in plant physiology. I am currently working on tobacco, within a project aiming at reducing smoke toxicity.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving other people a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase books, videos, and music for a college library and the professional staff.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Its a joy to help and a bigger joy to be repaid (so someone else can be helped).

lenders.name: Jeannie
lenders.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to enrich someone's life - someone that one might otherwise never know about or meet. Helping people blossom using their own gifts and skills is my pleasure.
lenders.occupational_info: Whenever a teacher needs to be out of his or her classroom, a substitute is needed to keep learning on track for the students - that's where I come in!

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva to be such a wonderful program and I am happy to be able to provide a little assistance to others in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I am always for the under dog in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I support ( 8 ) familes in Vietnam and also pay for all the kids schooling.

lenders.name: Bette
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women to be self sustaining and resourceful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women who do not have health ins get preventative services.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: No boundaries; no limits; no fears.

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small investments made collectively can have a dramatic impact on the lives of hardworking and enterprising people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a healthcare provider to women in a large city family health center.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I am at a point in my life where I am able to give.

lenders.name: Dorothea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and give back.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We should all help out when we can!

lenders.name: bill
lenders.loan_because: I've always enjoyed the markets I work in, and appreciate the success of my business and good health of my family.  Glad to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: buying, warehousing and reselling commodity chemicals

lenders.name: The Vargas-Perez Family
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am always looking for ways to give back to the world for the blessings I have received from it. This concept is also an easy sell to friends when I ask them, "how much would you give if you knew you could get it all back?"
lenders.occupational_info: Helping adults learn new computer programs.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and  want to make a difference by blessing others

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: It is something that I strongly believe in and I must admit that it makes me feel good to be able to help. Small business is a way to grow the world and it is one sector of the world economy that keeps more people employed than large corporations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the computer industry.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I would go to the market and buy Potatoe chips or cookies,cigarettes, and ice cream.Would total at least 13.00-25.00 monthly for these items . Now, I really do not need to eat or use these products due to the fact I am diabetic.So I figure  the money I use to buy fattening foods and cigarettes could be donated for a better purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and part-time student

lenders.name: Annemarie
lenders.loan_because: "No one has ever become poor by giving."  Anne Frank

lenders.name: The Jurgensens
lenders.loan_because: GIving is what life is all about.  We hope to make a difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: In 2001 we opened our own catering business.  It was a very scary adventure for us because we did not have any customers.  We have now grown and our reputation for delicious food and great customer service serves us best.  We provide food and service at weddings and all different types of celebrations.

lenders.name: Gavin and Kim
lenders.loan_because: We feel we are blessed in so many ways and we want to do what we can to share those blessings with others.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I want others to become successful business owners and be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a commercial sign company - we design and fabricate signs for small and large businesses.  My partner is my husband, Al

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that sometimes a person simply needs to be given a  chance in order to succeed.  So to be a part of that opportunity is wonderful; and an excellent way to "pass it on".
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an agency which provides programming and services to individuals (adults and children) who are developmentally disabled.   I am able to see first hand each day, how when someone is given a chance to succeed; he/she will take that opportunity and make the most of it.

lenders.name: ANN
lenders.loan_because: I THINK THERE IS NO GREATER WAY TO SAY THANK YOU FOR THE BLESSINGS I HAVE (FAMILY, FRIENDS, HEALTH) THAN TO GIVE BACK TO OTHERS
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A BUSINESS MANAGER OF A MEDICAL PRACTICE THAT TAKES CARE OF CHILDREN.  I DO THE BOOK KEEPING, PAYROLL, TAXES, ETC.

lenders.name: Jude
lenders.loan_because:
Giving is the way to a better world.
Giving to others helps them better themselves and helps them to give, too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a "Jack of all Trades", 
A master of many.
Whatever you spend,
I'm worth every penny!

lenders.name: Jamie & Wendy
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have a successful business and want to share it with  people who are struggling because they don't have the same opportunity and it makes us feel awesome to be able to help in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: Our work is very physical and also very artistic. We create custom concrete finishes for customers for their homes etc. we do driveways, patio's, walkways, countertops, pool decks, floors etc.It is also seasonal because of our winters. We can't pour concrete in really cold weather.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me feel good.
We are all connected mysteriously somehow.
lenders.occupational_info: Understanding the puzzle pieces that make up who you are and helping you to put your puzzle pieces together, empower you... to create a joyful, peaceful, fulfilling life.

lenders.name: Neta
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given and thankful to have the honor to make others' lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a corrugated packaging company,  supporting and training customer service and administrative employees using our computer system.  I also troubleshoot problem transactions and create reports for managers.

lenders.name: SALLY
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and need to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who work hard to process orders for customers for our copier equipment.

lenders.name: Rena
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: help clients with their insurance

lenders.name: Bob & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It's simply  the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: We're trying to make the world a better place one step at a time.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.loan_because: if I can help a few people out there to full fill the goal and dream I want to.  It helps to not take little things for granite. so easily.  I know how it feels when someone reaches out to help you.  Give you a warm feeling inside and you feel like you do matter in this world.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I can and I see it as my responsibility to be a part of making the world a better place.  It's a great thing for my kids to see too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people turn their dreams into reality,  through the power of visualization and mentorship.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals of self sufficiency and I know a little can do a lot sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce and sell 2 different games and organic skincare products.  I also sell clothing and jewelry made by others.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit and want to support those who are working to make life better for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the University of California, San Francisco.  I am responsible for ensuring that our patients receive the best healthcare in the world.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: The only thing that truly makes us different is geography.  I've had so many people give me a helping-hand and I want to do the same for other women so they can be strong and independent individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my two, young daughters.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish, it makes me feel good and I love the idea of giving a "hand up."
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math to struggling 7,8, and 9 year old students.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people around the world who do not have the advantages that we have here in America.

lenders.name: Savanna
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that wealth properly utilized will generate more wealth and contribute to the overall prosperity of our global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals to have a successful business and a successful life.

lenders.name: Cesely
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an impact on others

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people manage their money and reach their financial goals
